de.jcommandlineparser.options
Class AbstractOption<T>

java.lang.Object
  de.jcommandlineparser.options.AbstractOption<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of value
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractMultiOption, AbstractSingleOption, VoidOption
public abstract class AbstractOption<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the abstract representation of a command line option.

Author:
Alexander Kerner

addClashOption

public void addClashOption(AbstractOption<?> clashOption)

Defines another option, that will exclude this option to be set and vice versa. Calling this method will also call addClashOption() on clashOption.

Parameters:
clashOption -

public abstract void parse(java.lang.String string)
                    throws NoValueGivenException

Parameters:
